item.description:
Please RSVP! This Meetup will fill up fast! 

Trade Selection Using the Best of the Best

This session will help you understand the best of the best of the most accurate technical timing indicators. Armed with this knowledge you will be better informed on how to confirm your trade set-ups so you can decide the risk and reward objectives. Then, with that information you will be able to improve your decision process for allocating the proper position size for your account.

 

Here is a link to a map of building 6 at MIT: http://whereis.mit.edu/?go=6 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

To join our online discussion go to http://groups.google.com/bostonibd .  If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you! Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room. We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone. This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Special Speakers Meeting: John Person
